ygData.subject: Re: Brass
ygData.msgSnippet: ... No, it goes up without damaging things. ... Or if you are into risks...*laughs* I went and stood in a corner out in the newbie area of N. Qeynos to raise
ygData.messageBody:
>>This has probably been asked before, but HOW IN THE
>>WORLD can one practice Brass? It seems that unless
>>you are actually damaging something, brass skill won't
>>go up.


No, it goes up without damaging things.

>The Arena + A brass horn + DDD + 4-8 hours = max brass skill.


Or if you are into risks...*laughs*

I went and stood in a corner out in the newbie area of N. Qeynos to raise
mine, I MIGHT have killed snakes and rats and gnoll pups, but I wouldn't
know as I was sleeping *laughs*

Several levels later I decided to top it off again, I just stood behind a
tree in E Karana near the High Pass hold zone...

Tszaaz E'Taurguin
